title: Login page not loading
description: Users are unable to access the login page. The page shows a blank screen with no error message.

title: Database connection timeout
description: Application experiencing intermittent database connection timeouts during peak hours.

title: Email notifications not sending
description: Users are not receiving email notifications for important updates and alerts.

title: Mobile app crashes on startup
description: Mobile application crashes immediately after launch on iOS devices running version 15.0+.

title: API rate limiting too restrictive
description: API rate limiting is preventing legitimate users from accessing the service. Need to adjust limits.

title: Search functionality broken
description: Global search is not returning any results regardless of the search term entered.

title: Payment processing error
description: Credit card payments are failing with a generic error message. Need to investigate payment gateway integration.

title: User profile image upload failing
description: Users cannot upload profile images. The upload button is unresponsive and no error message is shown.
